title: A hmangaihna fakin i zai ang
lyrics:
A hmangaihna fakin i zai ang,
Hmangaihna dai thei ngai lova chu;
Beramno thah thisen chhuaka chu,
Amah kan fak hun ni thlen hmain.

Nakinah, lawm takin,
Luipui kam mawi takah kan tawk ang. 2

Thisen vangin Pathian ding lamah,
Chatuan nunna leh hlimna chu a awm;
Mi tin tan nunna tui a luang a,
Chu tui chuan Lalpanmin bual ang a.

A hmangaih tunah kan tem chauh va,
Ama hmingin lawmin kan khat a;
Van thlen hunin eng nge awm leh ang?
Beramno thianghlim kan zaipui ang.

A hminga kan intawh khawm hunin,
Kan chatuan hmunah min tir ang a;
Lawm takin Pa in kan thleng ang a,
Kan Chatuan Malsawmna ramah chuan.
